snippet: While much of the World Trade Center Memorial Plaza has already opened to the public, the memorial museum, which lies 70 feet below ground at bedrock, has been delayed because of arguments over financing. Here are some of the expected features when...
lead_paragraph: While much of the World Trade Center Memorial Plaza has already opened to the public, the memorial museum, which lies 70 feet below ground at bedrock, has been delayed because of arguments over financing. Here are some of the expected features when the museum opens. That date is still not set.

headline.seo: Challenges Remain for September 11 Memorial Museum
headline.main: Challenges Remain for the September 11 Memorial Museum
